videoJson.name: Digital8
videoJson.fact1: A Video8 or Hi8 tape can be recorded in digital mode, but a 2 hour tape could only store 1 hour of digital content
videoJson.fact2: While predecessor 8mm formats Video8 and Hi8 were analog, Digital8 stored digital video
videoJson.fact3: Digital8 decks could only record in DV but could still read Video8 and Hi8 tapes
